Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    Abstract class which extends the Action class and contains the logic for attacking.
    BasicAttackAction
    The BasicAttackAction extends the abstract AttackAction class.
    BreakAction
    The BreakAction class is a special Action for breaking dormant actor's shell.
    ConsumeAction
    The ConsumeAction class is a special Action for using Magical Items.
    ConsumeWaterAction
    ConsumeWaterAction is a class that extends Action, which implements the logic for consuming Water specifically.
    FillAction
    FillAction extends Action.
    FireAttackAction
    FireAttackAction is a class which extends AttackAction and allows Actor to attack other Actors by spawning Fire items on the map.
    FirePunchAction
    FirePunchAction is a special attack which attacks another Actor with both a punch and by using fire
    FlattenAction
    The FlattenAction class is a special Action for crushing high-grounds and turning them into dirt.
    InstakillAction
    Extension of AttackAction class which allows for attacks that instantly defeat another Actor
    JumpAction
    The JumpAction class is a special Action for jumping onto high-grounds.
    PickUpCoinAction
    The PickUpCoinAction class is a special Action that specifically picks up coins only.
    RescueAction  
    ResetAction
    The ResetAction class is a special Action for the player to reset predetermined aspects of the game once per life.
    SpeechAction
    The SpeakAction class is an Action which allows actors that implement the Speaks interface to have random monologues.
    SuicideAction
    The SuicideAction class is a special Action for an actor to commit suicide The SuicideAction class is a subclass of the Action class.
    ToadSpeechAction
    The ToadSpeechAction class is a special Action for Toad to say random lines based on the player's capabilities (i.e.
    TradeAction
    The TradeAction class is a special Action for an actor to trade with Toad The TradeAction class is a subclass of the Action class.
    WarpAction
    The WarpAction class implements the logic that allows an Actor to teleport between maps using WarpPipes This class extend the MoveActorAction and overrides its execution method.
